item.title: Upon release, the record-breaker became the biggest debut in Global Spotify history and the group’s fourth #1 hit on the Hot 100 in under 9 months. It was the longest-running #1 of 2021 & earned the group their second Grammy nomination.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: 2 years ago today, Olivia Rodrigo released ‘SOUR.’

item.title: Security guard for Taylor Swift’s Nashville show reveals that, although he works as an accountant, he applied for the job as a guard because he couldn’t secure tickets.
